Text:
I just signed up for an account to THANK YOU!!  My PVR froze when I was out all day for business and when I came home, I found out that it didn't record the game!!  After hearing people talk loudly about how good the ending was and hearing all the horns honking, it made me so angry that my PVR didn't record it.

So thanks a lot for the great up, and for all your uploads!  I'll be watching it tonight on my media player....better late than never!
Please seed Tampa X Boston too! Thanks for Brazil
I am not in N. America right now so thank you for the great UL.
ty.. Seed all I will seed HARD ; )

Nice to see atleast one person uploading Hockey,But I was wondering could you possibly upload The Stanley Cup Final in another format that isn't 720p? My processor can't handle 720.I'm in Argentina and would really like to watch my Canucks   GO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Vancouver!!!!
